description:
Kurokan asks Asai`s grandfather to make special cow dung bombs to serve as baseballs during Asai`s training. At first, Asia is very resistant.
Asai who is tied up and splashed with cow dung cries and laughs while trying to catch Kurokan`s cow dung bombs. 
He successfully catches the cow dung bombs and he has the confidence to catch Sakamoto`s 150km/h fastballs.
Other high school baseball teams from all over the prefecture contact Washinomori hoping to be able to hold a practice game after hearing about Sakamoto`s strength
Source: crunchyroll
